docs.snippet: More than a decade before Philip Johnson designed his iconic Glass House, French designer and architect Pierre Chareau designed the Maison de Verre in 1932 in Paris. It featured one of the world's first glass-brick exterior walls — three sto...
docs.lead_paragraph: More than a decade before Philip Johnson designed his iconic Glass House, French designer and architect Pierre Chareau designed the Maison de Verre in 1932 in Paris. It featured one of the world's first glass-brick exterior walls — three stories high.

headline.main: 'A Designer's Designer': NY Exhibit Showcases Chareau
headline.print_headline: 'A Designer's Designer': NY Exhibit Showcases Chareau

docs.snippet: Vaccination skeptic Robert F. Kennedy Jr. said he would chair a presidential panel to review vaccine safety and science at U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's request, drawing fierce criticism from vaccine experts who fear such a panel would give ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Vaccination skeptic Robert F. Kennedy Jr. said he would chair a presidential panel to review vaccine safety and science at U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's request, drawing fierce criticism from vaccine experts who fear such a panel would give credence to debunked theories tying childhood immunizations to autism.

headline.main: Robert Kennedy Jr. Says Tapped by Trump to Head Vaccine Safety Review
headline.print_headline: Robert Kennedy Jr. Says Tapped by Trump to Head Vaccine Safety Review

docs.snippet: Brazil will auction rights to operate fifth-generation mobile carrier licenses after 2020, once global regulators and carriers agree on terms for the bandwidth and frequencies of the new technology, the head of industry watchdog Anatel said Tuesda...
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil will auction rights to operate fifth-generation mobile carrier licenses after 2020, once global regulators and carriers agree on terms for the bandwidth and frequencies of the new technology, the head of industry watchdog Anatel said Tuesday.

headline.main: Brazil Watchdog Sees 5G Wireless Auctions After 2020
